title: Talc Tolchin Learn The Essentials Of Piano Vol.8 In-depth Chords

Learn The Essentials Of Piano Vol.8 In-depth Chords with Talc Tolchin (Learning the basics of piano (piano)

Year : 2002 Genre : video school piano Duration : 52:33 


Description : Professional musician and teacher Talc Tolchin advocates theory and ear training over note reading. In this second series of videos, Talc builds on the information covered in the first series and explores in much greater depth the topics of scales, chords, jazz improvisation, and accompaniment. The second series is for motivated musicians who want to improvise, deepen their knowledge of music theory, and learn to accompany a lead instrument or singer. eighth part (second series), the well-known video-school piano (piano) from a professional musician and teacher Talc Tolchin. Language - English, but given that music - an international language, almost everything is clear without any special translation. Explains lucidly, even clears the keyboard idle fingers in a chord, for clarity.)))
